Turning Walls into Experiences

A premium texture and surface studio crafting immersive environments.

Wallchemy crafts mineral-rich finishes for spaces that are felt before they are seen. 

Manifesto

A cinematic approach to surface craft.

Editorial, architectural, and quietly bold.

Material Poetics

We treat surfaces as emotional architecture—layering light, mineral, and touch into spaces that linger.

Studio Method

Every finish is developed in-house, guided by material science and editorial sensibility.

Signature Touch

Each finish is bespoke, calibrated to light, scale, and the emotional pacing of the room.

Studio Craft

Surfaces shaped by light, silence, and touch.

A refined collaboration with designers, architects, and hospitality leaders.
